about_the_game:
Welcome to Wraithgate, an intense co-operative gaming experience set in a dark, mystic realm. In this action-packed adventure, you and your allies are the last hope to banish malevolent daemons and uncover ancient secrets that lie hidden in a world shrouded in mystery and peril.

Features:

Co-operative Gameplay: Join forces with up to four players to challenge the forces of darkness together. Communication and teamwork are key to overcoming the daemonic hordes.

Banishing Daemons: Wield a variety of mystical weapons and harness arcane abilities to banish your foes. Each daemon requires a unique strategy and approach, testing your combat skills and tactical acumen.

Unraveling Mysteries: Explore a rich, detailed world full of hidden secrets and forgotten lore. Solve puzzles and uncover clues that lead to deeper, darker truths about the world of Wraithgate.

Prepare to step into the unknown. Gather your courage, sharpen your skills, and enter the Wraithgate.

name: Prototype

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 6400
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960

short_description: Embark on a Mystical Journey of Darkness and Light and explore the dark Site alone or with your Friends
